headline: Assessing Align Technology (ALGN) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Align Technology (ALGN) is drawing fresh attention after its recent share price move, with the stock up about 13% over the past month and roughly 29% in the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Align Technology. At a share price of US$189.20, Align Technology has recently shown stronger short-term momentum, with a 30-day share price return of 13.27% and a 90-day share price return of 28.54%, even though its 1-year total shareholder return of 1.85% and 5-year total shareholder return of...
